name: RecommendationsRelatedToMedicationRegimenChangeMedication
title: Recommendations Related to Medication Regimen, Change Medication
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that represent an instance where a provider recommends to a prescriber or provider in charge that a medication within a prescribed regimen should be changed.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to document a drug therapy recommendation to change a medication within a prescribed treatment regimen.),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that represent a recommendation to change a medication or therapy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any codes that represent an explicit action has taken place or other codes for recommendations that are not specifically for changing a medication.)

concept.display: Recommendation to change medication to generic equivalent (procedure)
Recommendation to change medication to therapeutic equivalent (procedure)
Recommendation to change medication to therapeutic equivalent on formulary (procedure)
Recommendation to change medication to lower cost therapeutic equivalent (procedure)
